str2: And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
